summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the acquisition of real property located at the southeast corner of 24th Avenue and East Howell Street in the Central Area Neighborhood for open space, park, and recreation purposes; authorizing acceptance of the deeds; making an appropriation from the 2000 Parks Levy Fund for acquisition, development, and related costs; accepting a gift from the Seattle Parks Foundation; directing the naming of the real property; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
